DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate reduction contact lens-related dryness symptom symptomatic weekly/monthly contact lens wearer switch DAILIES® AquaComfort Plus® lenses two-week period use composite score Contact Lens Dry Eye Questionnaire ( CLDEQ ) .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Daily Disposable Contact Lens Symptomatic Weekly/Monthly Lens Wearers
DOC.criteria: Currently wear weekly/monthly , silicone hydrogel traditional hydrogel soft contact lenses least 8 hour per day 5 day week past 6 month . Identified symptomatic use baseline screen questionnaire . Requires vision correction eye contact lens prescription follow : sphere power 0.50 10.00 diopter ( D ) cylinder power < /= 0.75D ADD correction . Able achieve visual acuity ( VA ) least 6/7.5 eye study lenses available parameter . Willing wear study lenses least 8 hours/day least 5 days/week discard lens end day replace lens every day new fresh pair . Willing able follow instruction maintain appointment schedule . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Neophytes current wearer daily disposable contact lens . Requires monovision correction . Any systemic ocular disease disorder ( refractive disorder allow ) complicate factor structural abnormality would negatively affect conduct outcome study . A history ocular surgery/trauma within last 6 month . Unwilling discontinue mechanical eyelid therapy eyelid scrub within 14 day enrollment continue study . Participation ophthalmic drug device clinical trial within 30 day enrollment . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
